level.text: 2920.1 Sections 2920 through 2941 govern procedures in rental housing cases atAH.
2920.2 For procedural issues not covered in Sections 2920 through 2941, theules in Chapter 28 apply.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674 (July 14, 2006); as amendedy Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12576 (December 31,010).
